## VimGolf Solution
```sh
:s/ninja/<CR>j:<Up>/g<CR>ZZ
```
## KdbGolf Solution
```q
`:out 0:@/[read0`:inp;0 1;{ssr[y;"ninja",x;"",x]}@'("";"f")]
```
